a.title: Legend for this format

title.value: Common model for EHDS document exchange

description.value: Common header elements for all EHDS document exchange.

short.value: Common model for EHDS document exchange

definition.value: Common header elements for all EHDS document exchange.
Metadata grouper
Unique identifier of the data object
Patient/subject information
Document/resource authoring details
Author by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information
Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the status of the resource

definition.value: Reason for the status of the resource
Business version of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

short.value: The human-readable representation of the data set

definition.value: The human-readable representation of the data set
